    PixelToDoubleCartesian.createFromCenterPlaneWidth(double xCenter, double yCenter, double planeWidth, int width, int height)
    Create a new instance of PixelToDoubleCartesian from the center coordinate and the width of the graph shown on image (maxX - minX).
    static PixelToDoubleCartesian

    Create a new instance of PixelToDoubleCartesian from the center coordinate and a magnification factor.
    static PixelToDoubleCartesian
    PixelToDoubleCartesian.createFromMinMax(double minX, double maxX, double minY, double maxY, int width, int height)
    Create a new instance of PixelToDoubleCartesian from the minimum and maximum x and y coordinates of the plane that the fractal is being rendered in and the dimensions of the image it is being rendered on.
